text: Polyporus ianthinus is a species of fungus in the family Polyporaceae. Found in Brazil, it was described as new to science in 2004 by mycologists Tatiana Baptista Gibertoni and Leif Ryvarden. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Fungi described in 2004 Category:Fungi of South America ianthinus Category:Taxa named by Leif Ryvarden
title: Polyporus ianthinus
